subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Skiing
Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: Marlies Schild of Austria successfully defended her first-run lead to earn her third consecutive World Cup slalom victory, capturing a night race in Flachau, Austria.
snippet: Marlies Schild of Austria successfully defended her first-run lead to earn her third consecutive World Cup slalom victory, capturing a night race in Flachau, Austria.
